name: IF-UpdateClickOnce
description: Gives you the ability to modify some properties on a ClickOnce Package.
author: Peter Helje

inputs.name: CertificatePassword
inputs.label: Certificate Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: Certificate password if needed, You should use a secret variable here.

inputs.name: Version
inputs.label: ClickOnce Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Set the version number of the ClickOnce package, Required format is N.N.N.N

inputs.name: MinVersion
inputs.label: Minimum required version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Set the minimum required ClickOnce version, use %version% to use the version as minimum. Required format is N.N.N.N

inputs.name: Advanced
inputs.label: Advanced XML modification
inputs.helpMarkDown: Here you can supply a JSON string that will be used to modify the specified node value in the .application file. Se default value for example JSON structure and required properties. Use # for comments
